title: Setting Goals and Avoiding Procrastination for Productivity
headline: This free online self help course teaches you techniques to achieve goals, stop procrastination and boost productivity.
description: Each of us wants to be successful but we struggle to achieve prosperity. Seldom do we realize that this elusive success has much to do with our shortcomings. Maybe we are not well organized or are in the habit of putting off the work or working at the last moment. This course takes you on a path of self-improvement. Learn the best tricks and techniques to achieve goals, stop procrastination and increase productivity to become a top achiever.
courseDescription:
Each one of us wants to be more successful. We want to fulfil our goals and gain abundance and wealth. We are all on the lookout for methods and ways to accomplish more. Somehow we don’t achieve the results we are looking for and find ourselves back where we started. We all look for answers on the outside, seeking professional help. Seldom do we look inwards at our habits and lifestyle. Most of the time, our habits and attitude are the real reason we lag in pursuing our dreams. This self help course takes you on the path of self-improvement. You will learn and apply nifty techniques to set and achieve goals, overcome laziness and increase productivity through some simple, engaging sessions.

We have designed the framework for this course in three easy steps to reach ‘masterclass’ status. We introduce you to the methodology of setting goals and achieving them. We teach you the tested ‘wish, outcome, obstacle and plan’ (WOOP) goal-setting technique or the WOOP strategy to set and reach your goals. We share the WOOP card as a free resource to help you plan your goals, manifest the results and become more accomplished. We walk you through essential procedures to overcome laziness and stop procrastination, including the Eisenhower Matrix Technique and the Pomodoro Technique. We guide you towards increasing your productivity through some best-known tools, strategies and practices like Action Priority Matrix and the Seinfeld Strategy. By the end of this course, you will be well equipped, ready and confident to make visible progress towards your goals and targets.

This ‘Setting Goals and Avoiding Procrastination for Productivity’ course will make you successful and attain more in life by helping you improve as a person. Whether you are in business, a student, an entrepreneur or in any other career, the techniques and tips in this course will help you become more productive, disciplined and able to gain meaning and success. Join the course and harness your true potential to attain glory and success by achieving your personal and professional targets and goals.
